docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: SUFFERERS of the neuropsychiatric ailment obsessive-compulsive disorder are turning to a two-year-old clinic at the Connecticut Mental Health Center in New Haven.

docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: ALL ITS LIFE, Miami has depended on image for survival. Over the years, it has hired some of the nation's most creative publicists to sell it to the world as a lotus land, a haven for middle-class hedonists, a place to make a fortune in real estate speculation, a city of intercontinental commercial excitement.

byline.original: By Robert Sherrill; Robert Sherrill is a freelance writer living in Florida

docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: AN ''alternative'' housing-integration plan approved by the Yonkers City Council nearly two weeks ago and ''welcomed'' by a Federal judge seeking an end to segregation in the city appeared last week to be facing an uncertain future.

headline.main: SITE QUESTIONS COULD UPSET HOUSING PLAN IN YONKERS

docs.snippet: LEAD: AN ''alternative'' housing-integration plan approved by the Yonkers City Council nearly two weeks ago and ''welcomed'' by a Federal judge seeking an end to segregation in the city appeared last week to be facing an uncertain future.
